short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Memotron Web Clipper enables users to save and organize web clips and highlights directly to their Memotron app.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Memotron Web Clipper enables users to save and organize web content directly to their Memotron personal knowledge management account with a single click, streamlining the process of capturing and storing online information for future reference and study.

**This requires a Memotron cloud account.

__Features__
* Save any web page to your Memotron account with a single click or using the shortcut.
* Annotate on any web page using our annotation functionality. The annotations will remain on the web page if you visit back in the future.
* Sync all your kindle highlights with a single click
* More ways to clip includes 
      * Screenshotting
      * Saving tweets
      * Saving Youtube timestamps
      * Adding notes and direct linking to a specific collection in Memotron
